title: Rainy city driving with police car and red truck
caption: A police car and a red truck drive down a rainy city street.

description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly down a rainy city street. There are several other cars on the road, including a police car and a red truck. The road is wet and visibility is reduced due to the rain. There are traffic lights and street signs visible in the scene.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions.
